title: STEM-Integrated PBL-Based Social Problem-Solving Project

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening interdisciplinary collaboration and creative problem-solving skills through real-world social issue simulations.

learning_goals: Students can analyze social issues in a VR simulation environment and derive solutions using an integrated STEM approach.

In PBL processes, learners (1) independently analyze three or more information sources (academic papers, statistical data, field cases) to derive two key insights, (2) propose one creative solution using the design thinking framework, and (3) write a collaboration report achieving over 80% in role distribution and feedback incorporation in 3-member team projects.
Participants can cultivate a sense of social responsibility and leadership traits based on project outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
